title: House Passes Four Bipartisan Financial Services Bills
summary: Today, the U.S. House of Representatives passed four bipartisan bills introduced by House Financial Services Committee Members. The Sovereign Debt Contract Capacity Act (H.R. 4111), a bill by Chairwoman Maxine Waters (D-CA). This bill requires the Secretary of the Treasury to direct the United States Executive Director at the International Monetary Fund to advocate that the Fund provide technical ...
